# NERelayErrorDomain

**Global Variable**

The domain for errors resulting from calls to the relay manager.

## Declaration

```swift
let NERelayErrorDomain: String
```

## Discussion

Match this constant to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError/domain] of an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] encountered when calling methods on [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NERelayManager]. The [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NERelayManagerError] enumeration defines possible [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError/code] values for these errors.

## Handling errors

- **NERelayManagerError**: Error codes specific to relay managers.
